TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed NumberCultureSource extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how the culture for numbers in a text run is determined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution> class uses the enumerated values of the NumberCultureSource class to determine how numbers are displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.NumberCultureSource Override = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Number culture is derived from the P:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureOverride?qualifyHint=False

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.NumberCultureSource Text = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Default. Number culture is derived from the value of the P:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties.CultureInfo?qualifyHint=False

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.NumberCultureSource User = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Number culture is derived from the culture value of the current thread, which by default is the user default culture.
